infos.value: ...Who's there!?
Hyaaa—!
Calm down, Etre. It's a human, same as us.
Phew, you scared me. I didn't think I'd be meeting any humans down here.
You're...a paladin, right?
Yes, what of it?
Ahh... Then you're the person Lilyth ordered to go to these caves?
Huh... You know about me?
If I'm not mistaken...you're the recruit that got eaten by the skeletons, right?
Obviously, they haven't eaten me yet...
When we said we wanted to join «Fortem», we were sent to this cave, too.
I'm Nasha. And you two are...?
I'm Etre. This is Yerma.
Nice to meet you!
Well, then. If you'll excuse me.
Hey, hey! Wait just a minute.
You're here to take out the skeletons, too, right? If that's the case, we should all work together—
Sorry, but...I fight alone.
I said wait! The skeletons here are quite strong, you know.
If you're not careful, you could lose your life...
I won't die!
Huh...?
Until I'm wedded to Lord Sterne, there's no way I can die!
Wait, don't tell me. Does this make us...rivals?
Sorry...
Hmmm, I see...
Well, then. Let's fight fair and square!
Come on, let's go.
We're all just wasting our time here, aren't we?
I'm not very familiar with fighting, but...
Paladins cut through vanguards to further their army's advancement, right?
Yeah, that's the gist of it.
I have an extremely poor sense of direction. Tee hee!
Don't tell me...
You've been wandering around near the entrance of this cave for three days!?
Wh-what's the big deal? Everybody has strengths and weaknesses, right?
Then I'll take the lead.
Are you okay with that?
Yeah, because I have this nose.
*Sniff sniff* ...
I smell monsters...!
All right. Then let's keep going that way!
